uno.card

Class ColoredCard

  • java.lang.Object
    • uno.card.Card
      • uno.card.ColoredCard
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ActionCard, NumericCard

    public abstract class ColoredCard
extends Card
    A colored card in Uno game, that is cards that have a color.
